contract_title: Code Style Standardization & Linting Enhancement Mission

contract_details.description: High-priority code quality enhancement focusing on style standardization, linting improvements, and code consistency. Implement comprehensive linting rules and ensure consistent code formatting across the entire codebase.
contract_details.background: Agent-3 specializes in code quality and standards enforcement. This contract addresses critical code style and linting issues identified in the repository analysis.
objectives: Implement comprehensive linting configuration (E501, E402, F401, F841, E722)
Standardize code formatting across all Python files
Resolve all syntax errors and import issues
Create automated code quality checking pipelines
Implement pre-commit hooks for code quality
Create code style guidelines and documentation
Set up automated code formatting tools
Validate code quality improvements through metrics
deliverables: Code style guidelines and standards documentation
technical_requirements: Code quality metrics and reporting tools
success_criteria: All E501, E402, F401, F841, E722 linting errors resolved
Code formatting standardized across all files
Code style guidelines documented and distributed
All stakeholders approve code quality standards

dependencies: Development environment with Python tools available

network_unlocks: Access to Code Quality Working Group

contract_history.details: Created code style standardization contract for Agent-3 (High Priority)
